## Last Failure (Wed Jan 14 17:50:56 CET 2026)
```

impl PaynumAdapter {
    pub fn new(config: PaynumConfig) -> Self {
        let client = reqwest::Client::builder()
            .timeout(std::time::Duration::from_secs(config.timeout_secs))
            .build()
            .expect("Failed to build reqwest client");
        Self { client: Arc::new(client), config }
    }

    pub fn with_default_config() -> Self {
        Self::new(PaynumConfig::default())
    }

    fn base_url(&self) -> &str { &self.config.base_url }
    fn api_key(&self) -> &str { &self.config.api_key }
}

#[async_trait]
impl Payment for PaynumAdapter {
